column2: 3 13 2003teleplay by brian buckner sebastian jonesstory by robert carlockdirected by gary halvorsontranscribed by eleonora pheeboh and vanessa
oh yeah let me just finish this
it's a new alumni website for college
you can post messages for people let everyone know what you're up to
great a faster way to tell people that i'm unemployed and childless
it's actually kinda interesting to find out what people are doing
the tall girl who wouldn't sleep with you
well her internet company went under and she lost an ear in a boating accident
bet she'd sleep with you now
let me see what you wrote about yourself doctor paleontology two kids
you split with carol because you have different interests
i think you split with carol because you've one very similar interest
i'm gonna finish this later ok
let me just grab my coat
what do you think you learnt how to do in the last two minutes
maybe we finish this for him
also i cloned a dinosaur in my lab
i don't care what society says
it's the best s x i've ever had
you can't do that to him
i think you made it clear you cannot be trusted with the ball inside the house
oh it was a lot of fun right up until chandler got a finger in the eye
what's hugsy doin' in the crib with emma
she was just crawling around and she found him so i just let her sleep with him
i mean i know how much you love him
let's be clear on this ok
i like him a normal amount
oh god i tried everything to make myself feel better
i even tried writing a song about it
i can't think of anything that rhymes with aarrgghh
hey monica i really need your help getting through this
you're not gonna need my help
well no when i get to the point where
i'm ready to hear cruel mocking jokes about mike
oh good 'cause i've already thought of 3
i've just thought of a fourth
i mean i know i did the right thing
you know mike never wants to get married and i shouldn't be in a relationship that has no future
pretty soon i'm gonna miss him so much
i'm gonna wanna see him again and you have to stop me from doing that
maybe it's too crazy about this
you know there is no future
but that doesn't mean we still can't have fun
that was a test and you just failed
i have s x with dinosaurs
i believe i read that somewhere
that only is not funny it's physically impossible
depending on the species i'd have to have a six foot long
i can't believe you put that on my alumni page
you'd better hope not because i just read what you put on your page today
look at you all sweet and innocent sleeping like an angel
with emma's chubby little hands wrapped around ya
it's okay emma you stay asleep
step away from the crib i have a weapon
it's okay it's okay rach it's me
well i heard emma stirring so i came to make sure she could reach hugsy
alright well now that i'm up i'm going to go to the bathroom
alright wait a second why would ross tell everyone in your class that you are as
gay as the day is long
because i told everyone he slept with dinosaurs
people have been calling to congratulate me all day
yeah well it came as quite a shock to me too
i guess i should have known
yeah i mean he just kept making me watch moulin rouge
and that was a great movie
i'm so gonna get back at ross
oh yeah this will show him here we go
well how you died was funny
oh please hit by a blimp
it kills over one americans every year
unbelievable my classmates are gonna think i'm dead my professors my
my parents are gonna get phone calls
you're messing with people's feelings here
you wanna talk about people's feelings
you should have heard how hurt professor stern was yesterday when i told him i wouldn't be able to go with him to key west
you've really crossed the line here but that's okay it's ok 'cause i'm on my way to buy some photoshop software and a stack of gay p0rn
your coming out is about to get real graphic
god i wish mike were here
okay if mike were here what would the two of you be doing
just to talk to him there's no harm in that
i don't need to eat the cake i'll just smell the icing
why don't i just eat a little sliver or okay just a slice or two
and next thing you know you're 210 pounds and you get wedged in going down the tunnel slide
phoebe honey i know this is hard
look if you talk to him you're going to wanna see him
and if you see him you're going to want to get back together with him
i know that's not what you want
yes it reminds me of a simpler time
damn you monica geller hyphen bing
it's joey and he brought home a friend
you promised not to bring girls home in the middle of the day anymore
no no it's not a girl it's
oh that's so great now emma has two hugsy's
no no emma has one hugsy the new hugsy huh
the other hugsy i don't know i guess i'll just take it back
when i was a little girl i had a little pink pony named cotton
oh i loved her so much i took her everywhere i would braid her tail
should i be concerned that a button fell off the old hugsy and i can't find it
oh no don't worry about that i swallowed that years ago
oh i don't think she likes the new hugsy
yeah i think she wants the old one back
you know it's a lot less surprising to do that after i've buzzed you into the building
so phoebe why are there men's shoes by the door
oh when you get over this breakup we need to go shopping
monica i really appreciate you checking in on me but i'm actually feeling a lot better
yeah i just kinda want to be alone right now
1 billion chinese people and they send mike
how did you even call him
there is a speakerphone on the base unit
look if i wanna see phoebe and she wants to see
sorry i guess i was thrown off by the mention of my name
look guys you can't do this it's just going to make getting over each other that much harder
why can't we just hang out as friends
if you're just gonna hang out as friends then maybe i'll join ya
you know i'm your friend and mike's friend
so how's the piano playing going
actually i've been playing a lot of love songs lately
you know on the way over here i saw this drunk guy throw up
and then a pigeon ate it
hey ross i just wanted to apologize
don't tell me you actually made those gay pictures of me
so that's what i would look like if i worked out
and was being serviced by a policeman
you're not actually going to send these out are ya
actually no i don't need to because your little ross is dead joke didn't work ok there were no responses
nobody posted anything on the website nobody called my parents so the joke my friend is on you
nobody called nobody wrote anything nobody cares that i'm dead
no come on you know that's not true
you get sixty responses just for coming out of the closet
well the gay community is a lot more vocal than the dead community
not even my geology lab partner
alright look let's think about this ok do you really think that people are gonna stir up your family at this tragic time
that people are gonna post condolences on a website
this is not about people not caring that you're dead
this is about people not having a decent outlet for their grief
right i mean come on i'm sure that if you had a funeral or a memorial service tons of people would come
you're having a memorial service for yourself
ross don't press send don't press se
oops sorry and so is the picture of you and the police man
i'm trying to put emma down for a nap have you seen hugsy
then what's that big lump under your covers
no now i know that emma wants him but he's mine and i need him
joey there is a reason that emma loves that stupid penguin so much oh don't cover its ears
it's because it reminds her of her uncle joey
and she's comforted by him because she loves her uncle joey so much
if you need hugsy don't worry
ok wait wait wait wait a minute wait a minute i mean rach i mean if if
if hugsy means that much to emma then
you're sweet i knew uncle joey would step up
you're going to take hugsy away from a little child
how do you think i got him in the first place
alright you two i'm gonna go to the bathroom
now i don't want anything going on while i'm gone
here's a few things you can discuss mucus fungus and the idea of me and ross doing it
no i'm not gonna ask you to get back together because i know we want different things but just to be with you one more night
i know i want that too but is that going to make it too hard
it can't be any harder than this
i mean if i had known the last time i saw you would be the last time i
i would have stopped to memorize your face the way you move everything about you
if i had known the last time i kissed you would have been the last time
if you don't kiss him then i will
oh i missed you so much
i asked him to keep me away from you
hi that's what i'm doing for phoebe
well you are not doing a very good job
hey at least i knew where my guy was
oh yeah yeah thank god you were here to oversee all the kissing
i've heard the speech if he knew it was gonna be the last time he saw her
it's been an hour and not one of my classmates has shown up
i tell you when i actually die some people are gonna get seriously haunted
oh this is so exciting my first mourner
i'm tom gordon i was in your class
i'm so sorry about ross it's
at least he died doing what he loved
i don't remember him but then again i touched so many lives
so did you know ross well
oh actually i barely knew him
yeah i came because i heard chandler's news
d'you know if he's seeing anyone
can i ask you a personal question
ho how do you shave your beard so close
ok tommy that's enough mourning for you
i'm dead and no one cares
please one ridiculous problem at a time
you gave them one day's notice not everyone in our class checks the web site everyday and monica
it's probably the way you stand
still somebody must have seen it
i mean i went to that school for 4 years i didn't have an impact on anyone
you had an impact on me i mean it's 15 years later and we're still best friends
i'm sure it's somebody for you
i'm here for ross geller's memorial service
i'm not gay i'm not gay at all
don't listen to him he's in a really bad mood
i can't believe that ross is gone
i didn't know ross and you were so close
we weren't but we had one class together
he was such a great guy and he talked so passionately about science
i'm sure that would mean a lot to him
and if heaven has a door i'm sure he's pressing his ear up against it and listening intently
i thought so many times about calling him and asking him out
i guess i really missed my chance
kori i know this is a big surprise for you
it's a long story but the things you just said really made my day
i mean the fact that you are here means more to me than if this room were filled with people
you sick freak who does that
i can't believe i had a crush on you
kori weston had a crush on me
i know it's not something to kid about
it was just a practical joke between chandler and me but it's over ok
actually no even if i had died you would not be left childless
